fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 192
fields.bodyText: * four works of fiction: Road Narrows by Elaine Closure; Past It by Anne Tiq; Gran Gets Tipsy by Sheri Trifle; and Afraid by Terry Fide and Sophia Full. Across 8 unmoor (wome)N (ai)M (t)O (g)O (fa)R after (xanad)U 10 yeah AH on YE 11 née N(a/m)E/(nam)E 12,26down* Terry Fide EDIFY/R(un) (rev) after TER(m) 14 fatwa FAT/W(eight)/A 16 enter (fin)E/(i)N/(fac)T/(th)E/(doo)R 19 alpacas AL AS 22 dry RY on D 23,32* Sheri Trifle RIFLE following (ancestor)S/HERIT(age) 25 piece double def 26 Fermi FE<(butte)R>MI(nine) [Enrico Fermi] 28 ark (d)ARK 29 safe gangsterS A FElony (hidden) 31 dragoon DRAG/(l)OON Down 1,17across* Anne Tiq A<(fictio)N/NET>1/Q 2,30* Sophia Full SO/PHIA L 3,15* Gran Gets Tipsy GRANGE + IS STY P(igle)T (anag) 4 ingest in jest (hom) 5 oratorio (tomf)O O(lery) 6 pour UP OR (anag) 7 espy Y(es)/P(endulum)/S(lowing)/E(vidently) (rev) 13* afraid A/F ID(o) 17 taupe TA PE 18 queues cues (hom) 20 cuspidor CU PID/OR 21 Crickets C + RICKETS [lack of vitamin D; Buddy Holly’s 1950s band] 24,21across* Elaine Closure ONE’S ALL ICE (anag) + URE 25* Past It CH after IT = ITCH 27,9* Road Narrows ROA<(fiel)D>N/ARROWS
